description: We’re big fans of the original Space Marine and so it’s no shock we’ll also be playing the sequel. So if you’re looking to hang out and watch me, Norman, and Bernhardt play the co-op campaign, consider swinging by our stream, which you can find below. We’ll be starting at 8:00pm EDT. See you then!
title: Tonight: Streaming Space Marine 2 Co-op Campaign Mode

description: One of the single best things you can do in a game of Magic is “Draw a card,” but only slightly less well-known is this: “…spells cost {1} less to cast.” Yes, reducing the overall costs of cards allows savvy players to chain together lines of potent combo pieces together to achieve victory, but largely […]
title: MTG Commander Focus: Costs, Reductions, and Eluge, the Shoreless Sea

description: The Road Through 2024 continues for TheChirurgeon as he tests some new lists for Warzone Houston and continues to work on his Night Lords.
title: TheChirurgeon’s Road Through 2024, Part 27: Renegade Raidin’

description: In our Faction Focus series we take a look at the game’s factions and talk about their rules, their units, how they play, and what competitive lists for the faction look like. This is part of a larger series of articles in our Start Competing series. In this article we’re looking at the Sons of Russ, the […]
title: Competitive Faction Focus: Space Wolves

description: The Great War has been something of a passing interest for me since I took a course on it in college. I needed to fill out my general education requirements and wanted a history class, but the wehraboos had already filled up the class on the Second World War so I opted into the prequel. […]
title: Goonhammer Historicals: Bacchus 6mm Great War French

description: The Dark Future terrain set is the first batch of Apocalypse themed terrain I’ll be covering for our How to Paint Everything: Marvel Crisis Protocol series. This set features multiple smaller terrain pieces, which act as set dressing for the two larger terrain sets that are also releasing alongside Apocalypse. All of them feature […]
title: How to Paint Everything: Marvel Crisis Protocol – Dark Future Terrain

description: With the recent release of the ‘Not Accepting Surrenders’ Squad Pack for Star Wars: Shatterpoint, Empire players get a great new Primary in Grand Admiral Thrawn. The accompanying Agent Kallus and ISB Agents are no slouches either, so chances are you want to get these on the table ASAP. Read on to learn about one […]
title: How To Paint Everything – Star Wars: Shatterpoint Not Accepting Surrenders Squad Pack
